definitions.definition: An emulsion of fat and comminuted meat (which has been subject to puréeing , grinding , sieving , chopping finely ) optionally mixed with other flavour carriers and either served up alone or used as a stuffing .

main_definition: ( cooking ) An emulsion of fat and comminuted meat (which has been subject to puréeing , grinding , sieving , chopping finely ) optionally mixed with other flavour carriers and either served up alone or used as a stuffing .
